给大家分享一个故事网上看到的：学生请假事件
     美国学生为玩《传送门2》集体请病假，教师无奈停课。热门游戏《传送门2》发售的前一天，美国一所大学的教授就突然收到了学生们的告假，而且大家不约而同都请的是病假。
    好在，这位杰夫·帕多教授足够通情达理，见学生们早已铁了心不来上课，便干脆顺应民意，在Twitter上回复自己的学生们，宣布2011年4月19日放假一天，让大家可以回去毫无顾忌地打他们朝思暮想的《传送门2》。
    杰夫在Twitter上写道：“同学们，我刚收到许多人的邮件，说他们病得太厉害没法来上课。鉴于有这么多人为了玩《传送门2》装病，那明天也就是4月19日我们放假。但记得补课时间是周三下午5点到7点，另外周四的课程安排不变。”
    而后，《传送门2》拿下了E3游戏展的三个主要奖项“最佳电脑游戏”、“最佳XBOX360游戏”和“最佳PS3游戏”。
    可想而知传送门这游戏在当年是有多火爆。
    个人评价：流程和剧情比1代更长更有趣，但是这一代关卡难度没有1代高，玩剧情的话建议和1代一起食用，毕竟1代和2代打折的时候两代加一起才9块钱，非常划算了。

Dang. I genuinely love Portal games. While the story is a bit disappointing and lackluster, the great puzzles make up for it. Keep in mind, just like the first Portal game, all puzzles are quite similar, and fairly easy. I would recommend Portal 2 to any fan of puzzle games, or other physics-based games.

PLEASE READ TO THE END....
This games is amazing to me and others. The story of the single player and co op modes are both super amazing and i know people love this game as much as I do. this game gave me so many memories through out the years it's amazing. I got it when it first came out on the Xbox 360 played through hundreds of times and was just so happy. I met my friends through here and we had a good time playing. Portal as a franchise has helped me get through some stuff and it has a wonderful place in my heart. So please, if you haven't somehow played this game i would it is worth the experience. Thank you Valve for this amazing game and thank you community for making this game so wonderful.
I would recommend this to others, but you have to play Portal for Portal 2 to make sense. Even though Portal is not as fun as Portal 2.

The best first person puzzler. Much fun and hilarity. The last couple of chapters are a bit stressful, but generally the game is very laid back - no time pressure, no enemies (unless you count stationary turrets), no perma-death and most importantly - you don't have to shoot anything (I mean, almost never, and never directly).
This is an example of the perfect sequel to an amazing game. This game has amazingly difficult puzzles, proper pacing, and fun character dynamics.
This game was AMAZING. I could barely stop playing it for the 11 hours straight that it took me to beat it. It is so intricately done with a great storyline and awesome gameplay.
Finally got around to playing the co-op mode, awesome experience even after all these years!

Cara eu nunca vi um jogo que me fizesse pensar tanto, um game de puzzles extremamente complicados e ótimo para passar o tempo, tendo um coop ótimo , certeza que roda em qualquer pc, se você gosta de jogos desse estilo e ta se perguntando se vale mesmo a pena, a resposta é SIM! recomendo

Despues del primer Portal vine esperando un juego a la altura pero sin duda este juego es una obra maestra, por que? Primero que todo, esta continua la historia del anterior juego pero esta es mas profunda que la primera entrega y se expande hasta el punto de ser excelente(no haré spoilers), las propias mecanicas del juego fueron aprovechadas y metieron nuevas formas de resolver los niveles mejorando la jugabilidad y diversion notablemente, lo que hace que el juego no se sienta mas de lo mismo que el anterior, haciendo que la experiencia sea mas dinamica y satisfactoria, los personajes del juego (que a comparacion de la primera entrega acá hay mas) tienen un gran carisma para que te sean super entrañables y te mantengan en constante entretenimiento durante la aventura, encima el juego ahora tiene un modo cooperativo el cual con un amigo puedes pasar una serie de niveles, solo he jugado el modo historia pero este ya es suficiente para recomendarlo, si el primer juego era imprescindible este aun mas. Es una experiencia inolvidable que cualquier jugador debe vivir.
Very entertaining puzzle game with a great story. Compared to the rather dark tone of the first game, this one has a focus on humor and a lighthearted approach to storytelling.
我对这种解密游戏真的很有好感，其次Portal的优秀也是有目共睹的，游戏的音乐和配音也很有氛围，剧情推进不会太快也不会让人觉得太过拖沓，总而言之Portal是非常值得入手尝试的游戏。
I dare you to name a game which has more co-op fun.

Capolavoro Valve. Veramente interessante come gameplay e sopratutto originale.
Divertentissima la co-op con gli amici.
One of my favorite games ever.
Epic puzzles, epic story, funny coop.

Very good game, Half-Life Alyx is better though.

Even though it's a classic by now, this game still deserves praise. I am in love with the atmosphere and the way the world was built out from the first game, which is practically a demo comparing to this one. Even if it's not perfect, no game really is and this one still manages to be a lot of fun almost 10 years after it's original release.
What can I say about this game that hasn't been told already. Just play it and enjoy.
Najlepsza gra z serii zagadek logicznych :D
I love this game. It makes me laugh constantly, especially playing 2-player. It has good replay value. Its premise is simple but it's definitely not easy. Highly recommend 10/10
